T02TD2876E:218a-0: @218a // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2876E:218a-1: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum ji snyed kyis //
T02TD2876E:218a-2: rjes gnang las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'i //
T02TD2876E:218a-3: mthu stobs bdag po gdug pa'i gnyen po la //
T02TD2876E:218a-4: dang bas phyag 'tshal sgrub pa'i go rims bri //
T02TD2876E:218a-5: dang por gnas dang dkyil 'khor bshams //
T02TD2876E:218a-6: mchod rten sngon po bum pa bcas //
T02TD2876E:218a-7: gta' bcas mchod rdzas khrus byas la //
T02TD2876E:218a-8: mchod rten sngon po bum pa dang //
T02TD2876E:218a-9: gta' gtor mchod yon byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2876E:218a-10: sems bskyed snod bcud sngags kyis sbyangs //
T02TD2876E:218a-11: tshogs bsags mgron gyi lha rnams gshegs //
T02TD2876E:218a-12: bgegs bskrad mtshams bcad tshad med bsgoms //
T02TD2876E:218a-13: stong nyid bsgoms la 'byung rnams bskyed //
T02TD2876E:218a-14: ri rab steng du srung 'khor bsgom //
T02TD2876E:218a-15: de dkyil gzhal yas khang dang gdan //
T02TD2876E:218a-16: yig 'bru rnams las lha rnams bskyed //
T02TD2876E:218a-17: thugs kar ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms //
T02TD2876E:218a-18: byin rlabs lus bsrung brtan par bya //
T02TD2876E:218a-19: ye shes 'khor lo dgug gdan dbul //
T02TD2876E:218a-20: phyag 'tshal mchod bstod sdig bshags bstim //
T02TD2876E:218a-22: dbang bskur lha rnam sa spyan drangs mchod //
T02TD2876E:218a-23: sdig bshags gzungs ltar rjes gnang bya //
T02TD2876E:218a-24: dbang bskur byin rlabs de nyid bstim //
T02TD2876E:218b-0: lce ni byin @218b rlabs skyon spangs 'das //
T02TD2876E:218b-1: bsnyen dus lhar gtad spro bsdu bya //
T02TD2876E:218b-2: thun mtshams phye la mchod gtor gtang //
T02TD2876E:218b-3: gshegs gsol bskyed bsdu mi dmigs bsam //
T02TD2876E:218b-4: bsnyen pa rtags ldan dngos grub blang //
T02TD2876E:218b-5: gta' gtor nam gung tho rangs dus //
T02TD2876E:218b-6: dbang bskur rgyas gdab bum lha gshegs //
T02TD2876E:218b-7: lus bsrung spyod lam rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2876E:218b-8: rtags rnams sgyu ma lta bur gzung //
T02TD2876E:218b-9: de don gzhan la smra mi bya //
T02TD2876E:218b-10: sgrub thabs gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag 'di //
T02TD2876E:218b-11: tshig rkang sum cus de nyid don bsdus nas //
T02TD2876E:218b-12: shes par byed pa'i don 'grel sgron ma 'di //
T02TD2876E:218b-13: byas pa'i dge ba sems can kun la bsngo//
T02TD2876E:218b-14: nongs pa mchis na 'phags pas bzod par gsol //
T02TD2876E:218b-15: slob dpon gsung gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
